state_variables._REQUIREMENT_hasVoted: MUST create: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => bool)) hasVoted - Per-proposal vote status tracking
state_variables._REQUIREMENT_noTokenBalance: DO NOT create tokenBalance mapping - Use getVotes() directly to check token balance

functions.vote: Vote casting - MUST: 1) Use getVotes(msg.sender, proposalSnapshot(proposalId)) for token balance (not parameter), 2) Use per-proposal hasVoted mapping, 3) Check BOTH majority AND quorum, 4) Auto-execute if conditions met
functions.calculateResults: Result calculation - MUST check BOTH: 1) Majority (forVotes > againstVotes), 2) Quorum (totalVotes >= quorum(snapshot))
functions.executeProposal: Proposal execution - MUST be called automatically in vote() when majority AND quorum reached, NOT as separate manual function
functions._REQUIREMENT_autoExecute: MUST check if BOTH majority (forVotes > againstVotes) AND quorum (totalVotes >= quorum(snapshot)) reached at END of vote() function and call execute automatically
functions._REQUIREMENT_getVotes: MUST use getVotes(msg.sender, proposalSnapshot(proposalId)) to get vote weight, NOT block.number or separate mapping

security_summary:
Contract Type: Governor
Classification Confidence: 95%
Access Control: role_based
Security Features: Standard
Based on: OpenZeppelin Governor

Reasoning: The contract involves a DAO governance system where token holders can submit proposals and vote on them. It includes features like proposal submission, voting, result calculation, and automatic execution of approved actions, which aligns with the Governor template for DAO governance.
